mapper.insert: insert into `pet-adoption`.account(username, password, email, gmt_create, gmt_modified, authority, nike_name) value (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{authority}, #{nikeName})
mapper.select: select * from `pet-adoption`.account a join `pet-adoption`.picture p on p.pic_id = a.picture_id where a.account_id = #{id} and a.account_status = 1
